snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia offered to replace the departing Austrians in the United Nations force patrolling a disputed area between Israel and Syria.
lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia offered to replace the departing Austrians in the United Nations force patrolling a disputed area between Israel and Syria.

headline.seo: Putin Offers Russian Troops as Golan Peacekeepers
headline.main: Putin Offers Russian Troops as Golan Peacekeepers
